de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.sword.api.service

Interface ComputeService<H extends HardwareFlavor,I extends Image,L extends Location,V extends VirtualMachine>

  • Type Parameters:
    H - the type of HardwareFlavor
    I - the type of Image
    L - the type of Location
    V - the type of VirtualMachine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseComputeService

    public interface ComputeService<H extends HardwareFlavor,I extends Image,L extends Location,V extends VirtualMachine>
    Compute service interface. Offers method for interaction with the compute API of the cloud providers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionService connectionService()
      Returns a ConnectionService that is used for connecting to virtual machines.
      V createVirtualMachine(VirtualMachineTemplate virtualMachineTemplate)
      Creates a virtual machine (VirtualMachine) for the given VirtualMachineTemplate.
      void deleteVirtualMachine(String virtualMachineId)
      Deletes a virtual machine.
      DiscoveryService<H,I,L,V> discoveryService()
      Returns a discovery service offering the discovery of stored entities at the cloud provider
      com.google.common.base.Optional<KeyPairService> keyPairService()
      Returns an Optional KeyPairService for the cloud provider.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<PublicIpService> publicIpService()
      Returns an Optional PublicIpService for the cloud provider.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteVirtualMachine

        void deleteVirtualMachine(String virtualMachineId)
        Deletes a virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        virtualMachineId - a mandatory id of the virtual machine.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the virtual machine id is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the virtual machine id is empty.

      • createVirtualMachine

        V createVirtualMachine(VirtualMachineTemplate virtualMachineTemplate)
        Creates a virtual machine (VirtualMachine) for the given VirtualMachineTemplate.
        Parameters:
        virtualMachineTemplate - mandatory virtual machine template.
        Returns:
        the created virtual machine.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the virtual machine template is null.
